My apologies to haggert2002 for the long delay in getting their post 
out.  The list is set to moderate first posts for new members in order 
to keep unwanted spam off the list and out of people's inboxes. I 
usually get a notification when there's a new message for moderation, 
but this one slipped through somehow.

I would like to remind the author, however, to please provide a header 
based on the template in our guidelines for submitting fiction to the 
list (this can be found in the Files section of the group homesite 
under "List Business" at 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ_Spy_Division/files .)   This is to 
protect both the author and the reader.

Thanks, and again, sorry for the horrible delay!

phil
(moderator)
